ThingDef.label: nutrient paste dispenser
ThingDef.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay. Needs Power: 20/200W

ThingDef.label: hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for use by nutrient paste dispensers.

ThingDef.label: food prep table
ThingDef.Description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: tailor's workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for cloth refinement and clothing production. Needs Power: 20/200W

ThingDef.label: smithing bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for turret and tools production. Needs Power: 30/300W

ThingDef.label: sculptor's table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.

ThingDef.label: powered crafting table
ThingDef.Description: A table and tools for assembling and disassembling machine components like mechanoids bodies and ammunition. Needs Power: 35/350W

ThingDef.label: cook stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals. Needs Power: 40/400W

ThingDef.label: stonecutter's table
ThingDef.Description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.

ThingDef.label: brewery
ThingDef.Description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew beer.

ThingDef.label: electric smelter
ThingDef.Description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Needs Power: 70/700W.

ThingDef.label: research bench
ThingDef.description: Researchers work here to discover new things.

ThingDef.label: crematorium
ThingDef.Description: Cremates corpses. Needs Power: 60/600W

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin 1x1
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow plants quickly. The basin requires constant power to work, does not need a sun lamp, but plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin 2x1
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow plants quickly. The basin requires constant power to work, does not need a sun lamp, but plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin 3x1
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow plants quickly. The basin requires constant power to work, does not need a sun lamp, but plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin 2x2
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow plants quickly. The basin requires constant power to work, does not need a sun lamp, but plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: hand sawmill
ThingDef.Description: A small muscle-powered hand saw for cutting logs into wood planks.

ThingDef.label: simple grill
ThingDef.Description: A small grill used to cook meat into simple jerky.

ThingDef.label: smelting furnace
ThingDef.Description: A wood-fired furnace used for smelting steel into steel bars.

ThingDef.Label: glassworks
ThingDef.Description: A table with all the tools you need to make glass. Needs Power: 50/500W

ThingDef.Label: saftey glassworks
ThingDef.Description: A table used for turning normal glass into safety glass. Needs Power: 10/100W

ThingDef.Label: Electronics workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped with fine tools to design and make advanced (but still home-made) electronic devices. Needs Power: 30/300W

ThingDef.label: chemlab
ThingDef.Description: A chemical laboratory with all the equipment needed to create medkits. Needs Power: 40/400W

ThingDef.label: Mark I Matter Replicator
ThingDef.Description: An advanced matter replication device. Replicate basic ressources from OmniGel. Needs Power: 120/1200W

ThingDef.label: electric oven
ThingDef.Description: An oven. Needs Power: 50/500W

ThingDef.label: canning station
ThingDef.Description: A stove for canning foods. Needs Power: 20/200W

ThingDef.label: composter
ThingDef.Description: A composter used to turn food into mulch. Needs Power: 30/300W

ThingDef.label: coffee machine
ThingDef.Description: A machine built for the preparation of coffee beans. Needs Power: 15/150W

ThingDef.label: tobacconist table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for the preparation of tobacco

ThingDef.label: tailor's loom
ThingDef.Description: A tailor's table used to spin raw materials into usable cloth.

ThingDef.label: Weapon Crafting Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench to produce primitive weapons.

ThingDef.label: Weapon Crafting Table
ThingDef.Description: A table to produce weapon parts and guns. Needs Power: 50/500W.

ThingDef.label: futuristic weapon crafting
ThingDef.Description: A table to produce futuristic weapons. Needs Power: 80/800W.

ThingDef.Label: fishing pier
ThingDef.Description: A simple and solid fishing pier. Keeps your feet dry when fishing.

ThingDef.Label: fishing pier
ThingDef.Description: A simple and solid fishing pier. Keeps your feet dry when fishing.

ThingDef.Label: aquaculture basin
ThingDef.Description: A basin designed to breed fishes. Water quality is auto-regulated. Needs external temperature regulation and food in attached hopper to feed the fishes. Needs constant Power: 500W

ThingDef.label: aquaculture hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds food to feed bred species in aquaculture basins. This hopper is refrigerated and food within will not spoil if powered.

ThingDef.label: prosthetics workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of prostheses. Needs Power: 50/500W

ThingDef.label: bionics workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of high tech bionics. Needs Power: 80/800W

ThingDef.label: organ vat
ThingDef.Description: Used to turn human corpses into biomatter and grow replacement organs. Needs Power: 80/800W

ThingDef.label: well
ThingDef.Description: A well. Fill water from it into buckets to carry it around.
